item.title: Book Review; The Power of Habit
item.description: TL;DR The Power of Habit by Charles Duhigg is an engaging and empowering book all about how each one of us truly are – as Duhigg and many others have noted – creatures of habit. Nearly everything we do from how we talk to our friends and loved ones to what we “choose” to eat for lunch each day is really just a habit that has been ingrained in our minds over time.
